data.text: @itsaidwhats @CBCEdmonton More like Edmonton Council doing so. They want to have a bylaw forcing masks. If they weren't idiots trying to play doctor & going against provincial jurisdiction, and just let people decide on their own, this provincial legislation would not have been required.

@SonKris780 @CBCEdmonton How is Edmonton Council wanting to have a bylaw forcing masks "freedom of choice"? If they weren't idiots trying to play doctor, just let people decide on their own, this provincial legislation would not have been required.

@CBCEdmonton The province is pushing ahead because though Edmonton dropped current mask bylaw, they still want to play doctor and bring in a new one. Idiot Councils like Edmonton's should stay out of health matters that are provincial responsibility, & focus on municipal issues.

@catswarm @CBCEdmonton liberals were going to give the provinces more power and autonomy as well proportional representation but that was all a lie as well. Reality is if Canada was to have a PRv electoral system the liberals would almost never form government again often the NDP would have more seats
@CBCEdmonton Can someone tell the cons to shut up because itâ€™s freedom of choice until it inconveniences them
@CBCEdmonton Healthcare is provincial and should be decided by the provincial government. Anything else is political theatre.
@CBCEdmonton I'm good without wearing a mask after 2 years.. if you want to wear yours go ahead..
@Bev93934207 @CBCEdmonton Dictators implement restrictions, not lifting them.
